text:
Abdourahmane Barry (born 21 February 2000) is a French footballer who plays as a center-back for FC Liefering in the 2. Liga.
Club career.
Barry started playing football professionally on 27 July 2018 in the 2. Liga. He played a full game against SV Horn.
Personal life.
Barry was born in Courbevoie, France and is of Guinean descent.
